'''Epitome Invocation''' is a [[Weapon Event Wish]] in [[Version 1.2]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2021-01-12 18:00:00 &ndash; 2021-02-02 14:59:59

===Summary===
* In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star weapons [[Skyward Pride]] (Claymore) and the 5-star weapon [[Amos' Bow]] (Bow) will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* In this event wish, 4-star weapons [[Sacrificial Sword]] (Sword), [[The Bell]] (Claymore), [[Dragon's Bane]] (Polearm), [[Eye of Perception]] (Catalyst), and [[Favonius Warbow]] (Bow) will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapon will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
